<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rapid Response](/Feats.aspx?ID=1698) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
An ally is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance. You Stride towards the triggering ally. You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during this movement.
name: Rapid Response
